      abstract MBoundingBox MGeometricObject.getBoundingRectangle()
      Calculates the bounding rectangle of the given geometric object and returns it.
      Methods in eu.zidek.augustin.minuscule with parameters of type MBoundingBox 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static MCoordinate LabelPositioningUtils.alignAccordingToAngle(MBoundingBox boundingRect, double angleDeg)
      This method takes the given bounding rectangle and shifts it according to the given angle so that:
      If the angle is 0-90 the lower left corner of the rectangle is on the original position.
      static MCoordinate LabelPositioningUtils.getAutoPlacementToRectangle(double angleDeg, MBoundingBox rectangle, java.awt.Font font, java.lang.String text)
      Determines relative coordinates of a label placed on a circumference of a (bounding) rectangle at the given angle.
